description: Whether your site was designed by us or not, benefit from flawless WordPress maintenance. Our unique WordPress maintenance plan suits everyone, whether you are a craftsman, independent or business, offering quality maintenance at a price that respects your budget. Benefit from a high-performance and secure website, allowing you to concentrate fully on the development of your activities.
title: What does our WordPress Maintenance include?
bottom: Don't leave your WordPress site unattended. Opt for our maintenance and ensure the performance, security and sustainability of your site.

list.description: Make sure your site is always up to date with the latest version of WordPress, themes and plugins, avoiding any malfunctions.
Protect your data with complete backups of your site, including source files, database, images and media.
Prevent attacks with regular updates and the installation of a specific security plugin.
A well-maintained site means a faster, better referenced and more compatible site.
When faced with a bug or crash, our team is your first resort for a quick and efficient resolution.
Avoid negative impacts on your SEO and user experience with our broken link detection and repair tool.
